channel.title: Home on James Rea Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on James Rea Blog

item.title: Today I Learnt
item.description:
A running log of things I learn day today, whatever day.

2025-11-29 #

Generally, in a CI/CD pipeline, it is better to make the CI do the heavy lifting (artifact creations) than the CD.

Longer CD tasks will make rollbacks less easy, which isn’t really desired.

item.title: 01 - Types of TEEs
item.description: A whistle stop tour of the types of TEEs.

item.title: A bit about me!
item.description:
I am a half Belgian/English Senior Software Engineer, working in a London-based voice-GenAI scale up.

Please find my CV.

I like traveling, black coffees and trail runs.

Feel free to reach out to say hi!
